pullrequest.title: Request a service from the command line

content.raw:
This is probably a lot more work, but an alternate solution is:

1. Support the ability to get the response and requests message definitions from the service provider.
2. Use the two message definitions to instantiate the correct message types, and then send the service request.

This approach will work with custom messages, whereas this PR will only work with messages in `ign_msgs`.
